Page.Name: TitlePage
Page.Text: :3c66d8d48e7a0d2d:Dungeon Maker Toolbox
:3c66d8d4c79090d9:Dungeon Maker lets you create your own dungeon for others to play.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text:
:3c66d8d4de41d3ed:Challenge rating measures the size and complexity of your dungeon. Each spawner and effect object you place increases the challenge rating. Effect objects increase the point value for each spawner it affects.
The challenge rating value for each object is displayed to the right of the object name.
:3c66d8d4de78a495:Challenge Rating
:3c66d8d45835915d:Filtering
:3c66d8d47895ddea:Click the filter buttons to toggle display of Spawners, Effect Objects or Decorative Objects. Search for objects by entering any part of their name into the search box.
:3c66d8d4493c8359:Placing Objects

:3c66d8d456f8610b:Select an object in the list and click Place Object. The object replaces your mouse cursor and is placed in the world by left clicking. Hold control when placing items to place multiple copies.

Page.Name: TitlePage
Page.Text: :3c66d8d4237667b4:Affinity
:3c66d8d47a10b022:The Beastlord and his warder are a deadly combination. You have unlocked affinity.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d428e49e78:Journeyman Adept Expert Master Grandmaster
:3c66d8d454aa96ca:Raising affinity increases a warder's rank. Each rank increases the warder's health, mana and ability strength.
:3c66d8d486f55400:Warder Ranks
:3c66d8d4d1a15366:Primal Affinities
:3c66d8d4f9735bc8:Maximizing affinity unlocks a unique primal tactic for that family.
:3c66d8d43d4170cb:Affinity Gain
:3c66d8d4be0569d9:Warders gain affinity through the use of primal tactics and advantages. Affinity is displayed on the Warders tab of the Character window.

Page.Name: TitlePage
Page.Text: :3c66d8d436d47aac:Primal Tactics and Savagery
:3c66d8d490c07560:You have unlocked Primal Tactics and Savagery

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d41a09daec:Savagery does not decay while in combat, but will decay while out of combat. Switching stances at any time will reset savagery to zero.
:3c66d8d4c9a1375e:Savagery

:3c66d8d43053c3ec:Savagery is a measure of how well you and your companion are working together. Execution of combat arts and advantages earn savagery points. Every 100 points of savagery generated will raise your savagery level by 1, up to a maximum level of 5.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d4e2424b1a:When out of combat you may right-click a Primal Tactic icon on the hotbar to swap the ability for a different Primal Tactic.
:3c66d8d46e7fb524:Primal Tactics
:3c66d8d46b8d6fce:Primal Tactics activate a temporary primal buff and expend savagery. Continued execution of primals will increase the power of the buff.

Page.Name: TitlePage
Page.Text: :3c66d8d40a542e7b:Advantages
:3c66d8d4c86ae43f:Your enemy's weakness is the key to survival. You have unlocked advantages and weaknesses.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d4a1298a63:While a weakness is in effect you can execute an active advantage.
:3c66d8d4592e8661:Weaknesses
:3c66d8d4257ecf1e:Your warder can spot a weakness on any successful attack. When this occurs, the weakness icon will appear for a period of time.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d4b40725c3:To change one of your advantages, right-click the icon on the Beastlord hotbar and select a different advantage from the list. This may only be done out of combat.
:3c66d8d40a542e7b_1:Advantages
:3c66d8d45a8332b2:Advantages are in one of four groups. Only the active advantage within a group can be used. Each group has a different theme including direct damage, dot and buff groups.

Page.Name: TitlePage
Page.Text: :3c66d8d46903d262:Tame Warders
:3c66d8d42b2a80c2:What is a Beastlord without a friend? You have gained the ability to tame a warder.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d463d53841:Summon Warder: Amphibian
:3c66d8d4111e37b4:Once complete, you will gain the ability to summon a warder from that family.
:3c66d8d480de08c8:Stare Down
:3c66d8d482b52a06:Taming can take longer if you are being hit. Use Stare Down to control the creature you are taming.
:3c66d8d405109ce0:Tame Warder
:3c66d8d4fee6de4a:Tame Warder Ability
:3c66d8d405109ce0_1:Tame Warder
:3c66d8d471ef6ada:Search for an animal you can tame. Engage until it is at \#FFFF0050% Health\/c and activate the tame warder ability.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d47d408d8c:Right-click a warder spell on your hotbar to switch between families that you've tamed.
:3c66d8d4c9e6c639:The appearance of each warder family is based on the last creature tamed from that family.
:3c66d8d405edd97b:...and 4 exotic families.
:3c66d8d42f93089c:There are 12 normal families...
:3c66d8d4895f8858:Warder Families
:3c66d8d4530bab7a:Warders are divided among 16 families. Each family has a unique set of abilities.

Page.Name: TitlePage
Page.Text: :3c66d8d4f513581e:Basic Movement
:3c66d8d4a6667dba:Norrath has many places to explore, and knowing how to move in the world is very important.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d48e176325:Keyboard Movement
:3c66d8d48b726e15:Press Spacebar to jump.
:3c66d8d40c260562:W - Move Forward A - Turn Left S - Move Backward D - Turn Right

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d4920cb319:Hold the left button, while moving the mouse, to look around.
:3c66d8d4de815c6c:Hold both buttons to move forward.
:3c66d8d4f71ba9b0:Mouse Movement
:3c66d8d4a07d59f1:Hold the right button, while moving the mouse, to turn your character.

Page.Name: TitlePage
Page.Text: :3c66d8d460cda7fd:Quests
:3c66d8d41a2750f2:Quests reward you with items, experience and the rich lore of Norrath.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d489c436ae:This symbol indicates that the character will complete a quest.
:3c66d8d4ed8f87ec:This symbol over a character's head indicates that a quest is available.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d4b2f22792:Right-click to open the available options on the character.
:3c66d8d488966f16:Double-click a character to open dialog with them.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text:
:3c66d8d4b622509e:The quest window summarizes the offered quest.
Click \#FFDF8FAccept Quest\/c to begin the quest.
:3c66d8d46ec25429:The mini-map displays icons for quest-givers near you.

Page.Name: TitlePage
Page.Text: :3c66d8d40c675a27:Tradeskills
:3c66d8d4596ad6ec:Tradeskills allow you to create many items from armor and weapons to furniture for your home.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d49834dcf9:To begin tradeskilling, click on a tradeskill station.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text:
:3c66d8d41df409a7:Use the recipe window to find the recipe you want to complete.
Enter a keyword to filter the list of recipes.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d4691ec697:The progress window shows how close you are to completion of the recipe.
:3c66d8d47c06c366:Use your tradeskill abilities to counteract complications and advance the progress and durability bars.

Page.Name: TitlePage
Page.Text: :3c66d8d40ef90af2:Broker
:3c66d8d420391707:Brokers allow you to buy and sell goods with other players.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d46affb156:Double-click a broker to access the broker window.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d4440637ef:Buying

:3c66d8d4585f1689:Use the Search field to find specific items.
Click \#FFDF8FAdvanced Search\/c for more options.
Click \#FFDF8FBuy\/c to purchase the selected item.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d46a0bddc8:Selling
:3c66d8d46f6904d7:Click \#FFDF8FSet Price\/c to set the price of the selected item.
:3c66d8d4b4146828:To sell, place a container in one of the empty slots under the "Sell" tab.
:3c66d8d465f71dda:Drag your item to the "Drop to Add Item" field.

Page.Name: TitlePage
Page.Text: :3c66d8d41d002013:Knowing the basics of combat will prepare you for the dangers within Norrath.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d4e3a06c8d:\#C0C0C0Grey = Trivial \#00E060Green = Very Easy \#30C0F0Blue = Easy \#FFFFFFWhite = Equal \#FFFF00Yellow = Challenging \#FF4040Red = Very Challenging
:3c66d8d4a8f2c4cb:Level 3
:3c66d8d413707879:a gnoll scout

:3c66d8d4df51418f:This is your target's health bar.
The color of the name indicates it's difficulty relative to you.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d47e91745a:Attacking
:3c66d8d4a77e154e:Double-click your enemy, press your auto-attack key or use any of your special abilities to begin attacking.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d4ecb84572:Hotbars
:3c66d8d4d4347cc5:When you gain new abilities they will appear here automatically if there is room.
:3c66d8d42b7c011e:The hotbar allows you to use abilities by pressing their corresponding key.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d4823ca79b:Special Abilities
:3c66d8d49c289364:Abilities can be found in your Knowledge Window \#FFFF00(K)\/c and dragged to a hotbar.

Page.Name: TitlePage
Page.Text: :3c66d8d40e731ab1:Grouping
:3c66d8d4a91ec9e1:Grouping will allow you to experience more challenging content and earn greater rewards.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d4578f858c:The group window displays the health and power of your groupmates.
:3c66d8d4694e40b3:Gandorff
:3c66d8d49a093fc6:Healerhank
:3c66d8d44eefc036:Slayerbob

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d44df3bb27:You can also type \#FFDF8F/invite <name>\/c in your chat window.
:3c66d8d43a5fd1e3:Right-click another player to invite them to your group.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d4694adc20:"Looking for Group" button
:3c66d8d47b8b5e28:Looking for Group (LFG)
:3c66d8d432a07d6b:Use the "Looking for Group" tool to connect with other players looking to group.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d4a8f2c4cb_1:Level 3
:3c66d8d4497d819b:"Player"
:3c66d8d4c070dc2e:"Target"
:3c66d8d49689683d:"Implied Target"
:3c66d8d44eefc036_1:Slayerbob
:3c66d8d413707879_1:a gnoll scout

:3c66d8d46bd23a50:Select a group member and their target becomes your "implied target".
Your hostile actions will be directed towards the enemy while beneficial actions will be directed towards your groupmate.

Page.Name: TitlePage
Page.Text: :3c66d8d4cc23376a:Inventory
:3c66d8d47a0df1e8:Your inventory is where all of the equipment you wear, and items you carry, are stored.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d4543c94d7:Some items can be used or consumed from inventory. Right-click them for options.
:3c66d8d4d8392a5a:Food and drink will give bonuses such as health and mana regeneration.
:3c66d8d474838997:Drop a piece of gear on your character portrait to equip the item.
:3c66d8d406bfae75:Double-click a bag or press \#FFFF00(B)\/c to access the items inside your bags.
:3c66d8d4b72c8ed6:This is your Character window \#FFFF00(C)\/c. It shows your equipped items and inventory.

Page.Name: TitlePage
Page.Text: :3c66d8d449fa9181:Interface
:3c66d8d4953712b0:The game interface provides you with valuable information as you play the game.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text:
:3c66d8d414a94efc:The player window displays your \#00FF00health\/c, \#0000FFpower\/c and \#00F0FFconcentration\/c.
Most of your special abilities require power or concentration.
:3c66d8d44eefc036_2:Slayerbob

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text:
:3c66d8d4d9419e54:The mini map shows your \#cF0000current position\/c as well as icons representing important characters and landmarks.
Mouse over them for more information.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text:
:3c66d8d4e8b81b9e:The Navigation Bar displays your experience and common shortcuts.
The orange bar shows progress towards your next level. The blue bar fills with each 10 percent of a level.

Page.Name: TitlePage
Page.Text: :3c66d8d42e4bc0d5:Character Advancement
:3c66d8d447e1ab13:As you adventure through Norrath, you will gain experience through combat and quests.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d4289a945b:When your Experience Bar fills up, you gain a level.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d4817a75c1:Apprentice Journeyman Adept Expert Master Grandmaster
:3c66d8d443956077:New Abilities

:3c66d8d4fe41fd96:You gain new abilities with every level.
These abilities are placed in your Knowledge Book \#FFFF00(K)\/c and hotbar.
Abilities become more powerful with each tier.

Page.Name: Element
Page.Text: :3c66d8d4e50bd1b9:Character Stats

:3c66d8d48dce30f2:Gaining a level and equipping better items will increase your character's statistics.
Statistics can be found in the Character \#FFFF00(C)\/c window.
